title: The Shadow of the Wind
description: A young boy discovers a mysterious book that changes his life.

title: Norwegian Wood
description: A nostalgic story of loss and sexuality.

title: The Alchemist
description: A shepherd travels from Spain to Egypt in search of treasure.

title: Out of Africa
description: A memoir of life on a coffee plantation in Kenya.

title: The Kite Runner
description: A tale of friendship and redemption.

title: My Brilliant Friend
description: A complex portrait of female friendship.

title: American Dirt
description: A gripping story of a mother and son fleeing to the US.

title: A Fine Balance
description: A deeply political and human novel set in 1970s India.

title: Snow
description: A poet returns to Turkey and finds it in turmoil.

title: The Little Prince
description: A philosophical tale of a pilot stranded in the desert.

title: Kitchen
description: A heartwarming story about a young woman navigating grief and finding solace in community and food, set in postWar Japan
